profile.introduction: I'm Allen Jamison B. Mendoza, an aspiring IT professional passionate about building innovative solutions that merge technology and business strategy. As an Information Technology graduate with Business Analytics specialization, I transform complex problems into simple, impactful digital experiences. Driven by curiosity and continuous learning, I develop web applications, analyze data, and design intuitive systems to make technology more accessible and valuable in solving real-world challenges.

achievements.description: Graduated Cum Laude from Batangas State University, showcasing strong academic performance and dedication to continuous learning.
Earned multiple certifications including IT Specialist in Data Analytics and Databases, IT Passport, and Web Development, demonstrating readiness for real-world tech challenges.
Built projects in web development, data visualization, and database management using React.js, Python, Power BI, and Tableau, turning ideas into impactful solutions.

expertise.title: Full-Stack Web Development
expertise.description: Crafting modern, responsive web experiences using React.js, Node.js, Tailwind CSS, PostgreSQL, etc. I build scalable, functional, and user-focused solutions across the stack.

expertise.title: Data Analytics & Visualization
expertise.description: Driven by data, I uncover insights using Power BI and Tableau, transforming complex information into actionable visuals and data-driven applications.

expertise.title: Creative & Scalable Solutions
expertise.description: Exploring smart database design, scalable architectures, and game development as creative outlets to push my problem-solving skills further.

education.school: Dr. Crisogono B. Ermita Sr. Memorial National High School

projects.name: Intern-Net 2.0: Enhanced Student Internship Management System
projects.shortDescription: A modern web platform streamlining internship management, DTR, and collaboration for students and partner organizations.
projects.description: A comprehensive web-based platform that modernizes the internship process at Batangas State University ARASOF – Nasugbu. Features include job postings, Daily Time Record (DTR) management, performance evaluation, real-time messaging, and a job skill matchmaking algorithm. The system significantly improves operational efficiency and enhances collaboration between students and partner organizations.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.shortDescription: A responsive React.js portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and qualifications as a developer.
projects.description: A personal portfolio website developed using React.js, Tailwind CSS. This site serves as a platform to showcase my projects, technical skills, and TypeScript. The website highlights my personal profile, qualifications, and projects as a developer, featuring a modern, responsive design and intuitive navigation.

certificates.title: IT Passport
certificates.issuer: Philippine National IT Standard Foundation Inc.
